#summary Scripts for text editing, productivity.

Currently, many scripts are on the [http://lua-users.org/wiki/SciteScripts Lua users wiki]. Some will soon be copied to the wiki.

== Formatting and Text manipulation ==
  * [Scripts_PerlFormat Perl scripts] for formatall, striplines, stripsppace.
  * HTMLTidy, from SciteWin
  * [http://www.gusnan.se/sciteproj/scite_hints.php Swap Header] Swap between source and header in C via a keyboard shortcut
  * [Scripts_Abbreviations Scripts for Abbreviations] Ease the maintenance of the abbreviations files
